data.comment: The match has started at Via del Mare.
Throw-in for Lecce at Via del Mare.
In the minute 2, Gianluca Caprari for Parma drives towards goal at Via del Mare. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lecce in the half of Parma.
In the minute 6, Parma are coming forward and Dejan Kulusevski gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lecce.
Throw-in for Lecce in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Lecce is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
Antonin Barak gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lecce.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hernani of Parma gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fabio Lucioni scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 0-1 at Via del Mare.
In the minute 12, Lecce awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Parma pushes forward through Dejan Kulusevski, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma goal kick.
In the minute 16, Parma's Gianluca Caprari misses with an attempt on goal.
Lecce have a goal kick.
In Lecce, Gianluca Lapadula (Lecce) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 16, Maurizio Mariani awards Parma a goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani signals a throw-in for Lecce, close to Parma's area.
Lecce drive upfield and Riccardo Saponara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Parma defender.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Parma.
Dejan Kulusevski of Parma smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Parma.
In the minute 22, Maurizio Mariani signals a Parma throw-in in Lecce's half.
Free kick Lecce.
Lecce have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 24, Goal! Gianluca Caprari extends Parma's lead to 0-2.
Hernani instrumental with a fine assist.
In Lecce a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Lecce at Via del Mare.
Parma to take a throw-in in Lecce territory.
Throw-in for Lecce in their own half.
In the minute 32, Lecce have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Lecce awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Lecce get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma's half?
In the minute 33, Throw-in Parma.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Lecce.
In the minute 34, Jasmin Kurtic (Parma) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Lecce in the half of Parma.
Parma's Dejan Kulusevski is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Parma.
Parma attack but Hernani's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Lecce at Via del Mare.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Parma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lecce in the half of Parma.
In Lecce Parma attack through Jasmin Kurtic. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lecce.
Parma's Gianluca Caprari breaks free at Via del Mare. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Lecce at Via del Mare.
In the minute 40, Goal for Lecce! They are now just 1-2 behind thanks to a Antonin Barak header.
That's a fine assist from Marco Mancosu.
Parma are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 43, Lecce's Marco Mancosu gets in a shot on goal at Via del Mare. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Lecce have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Filippo Falco for Lecce gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Maurizio Mariani awards Parma a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Bruno Alves (Parma) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Biagio Meccariello (Lecce) levels the score at 2-2 with a header in Lecce.
Filippo Falco with an assist there.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Parma have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team replace Bruno Alves with Kastriot Dermaku.
Parma are whistled for offside.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Lecce throw-in in Parma's half.
In the minute 50, In Lecce Lecce drive forward through Filippo Falco. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lecce to take a throw-in in Parma territory.
Can Lecce get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma's half?
In the minute 52, Andreas Cornelius puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 2-3.
Great play from Antonino Barilla to set up the goal.
Parma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Luca Siligardi is replacing Hernani for the away team.
Parma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Roberto D'Aversa (Parma) is making a third substitution, with Vasco Regini replacing Vincent Laurini.
In the minute 55, Lecce's Antonin Barak gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma goal kick.
Can Lecce get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma's half?
In the minute 56, Marco Mancosu for Lecce gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Parma have a goal kick.
Parma drives forward and Gianluca Caprari gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Parma.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Lecce in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani waits before resuming play because Andreas Cornelius for Parma is still down.
In the minute 59, Andreas Cornelius is back on the pitch.
Parma are coming forward and Andreas Cornelius gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Lecce at Via del Mare.
In the minute 60, Maurizio Mariani awards Parma a goal kick.
Lecce make their first substitution with Yevhen Shakhov replacing Filippo Falco.
Jacopo Petriccione is on a sub for Marco Mancosu for Lecce.
In the minute 61, Zan Majer is replacing Panagiotis Tachtsidis for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma goal kick.
The away team has substituted Andreas Cornelius with Roberto Inglese. Roberto D'Aversa is thus making his fourth change.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Parma.
Parma take a comfortable 2-4 lead thanks to Roberto Inglese.
Antonino Barilla instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 68, Lecce apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Yevhen Shakhov but the ball hits the post!
Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 3-4 through a header from Gianluca Lapadula.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Lecce in the half of Parma.
Fabio Liverani is making the team's fourth substitution at Via del Mare with Brayan Vera replacing Cristian Dell`Orco.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lecce.
In the minute 71, Gervinho is on a sub for Dejan Kulusevski for Parma.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Lecce throw-in in Parma's half.
Lecce have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 74, Lecce to take a throw-in in Parma territory.
Roberto Inglese gets his shot on target but fails to score for Parma.
Corner awarded to Lecce.
In the minute 77, Giulio Donati (Lecce) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lecce's Riccardo Saponara is whistled for offside at Via del Mare.
Parma's Luca Siligardi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Riccardo Saponara of Lecce smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Parma in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Parma in their own half.
Parma's Luca Siligardi breaks free at Via del Mare. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Lecce have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Free kick Lecce.
Parma needs to be cautious. Lecce have an attacking throw-in.
The home team replace Biagio Meccariello with Ilario Monterisi.
In the minute 89, Parma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Parma's Jasmin Kurtic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lecce defender.
Maurizio Mariani will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 3-4.
